comment.author: 김경환
comment.content: 확실히 요즘 시장이 뜨겁군요. 작년 연말과 비교해서 시간당 10불~20불은 올라간거 같네요 :)

post.content:
Hi Sungwook Brendan,
We have an opportunity that may be of interest to you: Senior J2EE Programmer Analyst (Opportunity 34944). Please take a look at the following summary:
Start Date : Jun 13, 2011 End Date : Dec 30, 2011 Rate : Hourly: $ 60 - $ 68 Sourcing Office : Toronto
Specialization and Skills : - Software Development - Java EE (5 - 7 years) - Oracle (5 - 7 years) - SQL (5 - 7 years) - WebLogic (5 - 7 years)
Additional Requirements : - At least 3 years with J2EE and experience with Weblogic is preferable (Mandatory) - Strong oral and written communications - ablility to be client facing. (Mandatory) - Able to be flexible and adapt to multiple projects as projects are completed quickly. (Mandatory) - Able to work well independently without extensive supervision. (Mandatory)
View full job description and apply online : http://www.sisystems.com///index.cfm?mg=cpo.details&uv=%25%26P%23V3%3C%5C%20%0A Refer a Friend : http://www.sisystems.com///index.cfm?mg=cpcanr.referral
Please note that we do not accept applications over the phone or by reply email. Thank you for your time and consideration Sungwook Brendan!
Best Regards, Thoywell Hemmings, S.i. Systems - Toronto
post.title: Senior J2EE Programmer Analyst, Cont', Toronto, 6 months
